Name: PenguinMaster
Notes: An elderly penguin NPC that can be talked to.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_B.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: This object can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.

Message.Description: The text message ID to be used. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and licked by Yoshi.
